00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_CRC_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_CRC_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup CRC
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup CRC_Exported_Types CRC exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /* Definition of CRC Init Structure                                                                         */
00054 typedef enum
00055 {
00056   CRC_CCITT_POLY              = 0,
00057   CRC_16_POLY                 = 1,
00058   CRC_32_POLY                 = 2,
00059   CRC_USER_DEFINE             = 0xF
00060 } CRC_Mode;
00061 
00062 typedef struct
00063 {
00064   CRC_Mode Mode;
00065   u32 uSeed;
00066   u32 uCR;
00067 } CRC_InitTypeDef;
00068 /**
00069   * @}
00070   */
00071 
00072 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073 /** @defgroup CRC_Exported_Constants CRC exported constants
00074   * @{
00075   */
00076 #define IS_CRC_POLY(POLY)         ((POLY == CRC_CCITT_POLY) || \
00077                                    (POLY == CRC_16_POLY)    || \
00078                                    (POLY == CRC_32_POLY)    || \
00079                                    (POLY == CRC_USER_DEFINE))
00080 
00081 #define CRC_NORMAL_WR             (0)
00082 #define CRC_BIT_RVS_WR            (1UL << 2)
00083 #define CRC_BYTE_RVS_WR           (1UL << 3)
00084 #define CRC_CMPL_WR               (1UL << 4)
00085 
00086 #define CRC_NORMAL_SUM            (0)
00087 #define CRC_BIT_RVS_SUM           (1UL << 5)
00088 #define CRC_BYTE_RVS_SUM          (1UL << 6)
00089 #define CRC_CMPL_SUM              (1UL << 7)
00090 
00091 #define IS_CRC_MOD(MOD)           ((MOD & 0xFFFFFF00) == 0)
00092 /**
00093   * @}
00094   */
00095 
00096 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /** @defgroup CRC_Exported_Functions CRC exported functions
00098   * @{
00099   */
00100 void CRC_DeInit(HT_CRC_TypeDef* HT_CRCn);
00101 void CRC_Init(HT_CRC_TypeDef* HT_CRCn, CRC_InitTypeDef* CRC_InitStruct);
00102 u32 CRC_Process(HT_CRC_TypeDef* HT_CRCn, u8 *buffer, u32 length);
00103 
00104 u16 CRC_CCITT(u16 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length);
00105 u16 CRC_16(u16 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length);
00106 u32 CRC_32(u32 seed, u8 *buffer, u32 length);
00107 /**
00108   * @}
00109   */
00110 
00111 
00112 /**
00113   * @}
00114   */
00115
